name: Tyree HART, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Tyree HART, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of April, 2012, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s pending Post Conviction Relief Act petition within 90 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 856
Tyree HART, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 159 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 10, 2012.
